My Projects

Check out some of my projects...

Nova is a modern programming language build from scratch and written in C++. Implemented the Pratt Parsing algorithm, and took advantage of the Visitor pattern to create optimized and efficient code.

Project Github

Created to aid members of DECA to study and practice exams wherever they go. Designed to solve the problem of the lack of a viable study source on the app market. Used Android Studio & programmed in Java.

Project Github

SpaceHunt is an open-world bounty-hunter game. Created using Unity and programmed with C#.

Project Github

Competitive programming portfolio (for Canadian Computing Competition). Used C++ and Python.

Project Github

Treehouses remote is an Android App used to communicate over Bluetooth to headless Raspberry Pi's running a Treehouses Image. Helped develop a Python Bluetooth Server, implemented an SSH client on Android, and worked in a team environment to continue to develop it.

Project Github

StatsCentral allows coaches and dedicated spectators to record statistics of their team for a detailed analysis. During the game, it tracks each stat and saves them to a database for access to these stats from anywhere. It is also possible to livestream the game stats to all fans.
